US Governor of Virginia, 
Ralph Northam

text: @GovernorVA This is moronic.  You will not prevent the spread of coronavirus unless everyone in the state self quarantined for 14 days.  Taking kids out of school does nothing but force economic hardship on parents.  I guess we’ll just blow up the economy and blame it on Trump? 🤷🏻‍♂️
